title: Odi vADA murugA
sahitya:
Odi vADA murugA en uLLam silirkka naTamADi vADA kaNNE


anupallavi

  tEDit-tEDit-tighaittEn nalla shem pon aNI kulungak-kiNkiNi silamolikka


caraNam 1    ponnuDal puzhudiyAccE kaNNE pudup-punalATTi aNi shUTTi magizhvEn 
    caraNam 2    innamudam pishaindE kaNNE iniya kathaigaL sholli UTTi magizhvEn
    caraNam 3    panca varNak-kiLiyE un paccai mazhalai kETTEn ucci kuLirndiDavE
    caraNam 4    konjum tiru nagahiyAl en kulamellAm deiva oLi kulungi viLangiDavE
    caraNam 5    kannam kanindiDavE unnaik-kaTTi muttamiTTa pinbu toTTiliDuvEn
